name: Brown Sales
description: Client wanted his website refactored and updated to have the ability to add and remove items he sells. Created a CMS thru contentful so customer could add and remove items himself.

name: Virtual Office Hours
description: While working as a teaching assistant the students wanted to be able to schedule time with me outside of class.  I created this site so students could do just that.  Site was made using React, Node.js, Styled Components, React Router, Express, and nodemailer.  Use email guest@guest.user if you'd like to take a look.
technology: React, Node.js, React Router, Styled Components, Express, nodemailer

name: Under the Weather
description: MERN stack app that is used to track illness/injury symptoms.  This app allows users to sign up for an account and store their symptoms so they can use this information when they visit a primary care physician.  A lot of us seem to magically forget what's been going on while "Under the Weather" and this app is used to help with that.

name: Park U
description: This my first attempt at a full stack application.  I made a game from scratch that was modeled, in a way, after the original Pokemon games and was intended to be a journey through a coding bootcamp.  Uses Node.js with Express routing and a SQL database and just your standard HTML/CSS front-end with jQuery.

name: Put Ya Thang Down...
description: I made this app to demonstrate a little bit of front-end design and some simple functionality.  Has a theme that you may or may not pick up on.

name: Phrasing!
description: This was one of the first apps I made using React.  Demonstrates the single page application and how it can be used to render content very quick.  Simple but a fun concept and small things like this can be used for practice.
